Docs.summary: The Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompilerServices namespace contains internal-use only types that support the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] language elements, see [Visual Basic Language Reference](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
